ACT
245
Assignment of probate cases to the work of notaries public
The court will entrust the conduct of probate hearings to notaries public based in the area of its jurisdiction in accordance with the provisions of this article.
Probate cases are assigned to notaries public to work in accordance with the ordinance issued by the minister responsible for judicial affairs. The Ordinance will determine, within the area of jurisdiction of a particular court, narrower areas for assigning probate cases to the work of notaries public, according to the criterion of proximity to the place according to which the local jurisdiction of the court for conducting probate proceedings is based and the place where the notary public is based.
In the area determined by the ordinance from paragraph 2 of this article, cases will be assigned to notaries public for work evenly in alphabetical order of their surnames.
